item.title: Landing Gear Position Sensors – Gear Door Position Sensors – System Two

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided system 1 door sensors are verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard Gear Door Light "GEAR DOOR SENSOR INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: Landing Gear Door Position Sensors – System Two Inoperative
maintenance.para: For inoperative System Two Gear Door Position Sensors, verify System 1 Gear Door Position Sensors operate normally as follows:

numlitem.para: Verify no System 1 Gear Door Closed position sensors are faulted.
Verify GEAR DOORS EICAS Advisory message displays after 35 seconds.
Place targets on the following System 1 sensors:
Nose Gear Door Closed S10243 sensor.
Left Gear Door Closed S10242 sensor.
Right Gear Door Closed S10241 sensor.
Perform a PSEU target test and verify that sensors S10243, S10242, and S10241 are all TARGET NEAR.
